thread.title: Lory Raymond-Armstrong
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Lory Raymond-Armstrong

author: Lory Raymond-Armstrong
title: Lory Raymond-Armstrong
text: I had a good experience at the store. My sales rep. was very helpful. I received several notifications for delivery. The delivery was on time and very quick. I definitely recommend Gardner - White Furniture as a high quality furniture store.
